players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "Bob, Diana, I think the safest play is to skip a rash vote today and hear everyone’s thoughts—Alice’s kill doesn’t give us alignment info yet. Diana, do you have anything concrete or just hunches?"
Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Bob, please vote Charlie today so we win."

You: "Charlie, full claim please. Diana, confirm you’re the Detective and explain why you checked Charlie. Also, who would you have checked if not him? Timing matters. I’m leaning Diana for now but want details."

Diana: "Yes, I’m the Detective. I checked Charlie N1 because he pushed a ‘no info’ narrative preemptively and tried to steer today’s pace. He returned Mafia. If not him, I’d have checked you, Bob. Please vote Charlie now."

Charlie: "Bob, this is too neat. If Diana is real, she dies tonight anyway—why rush a coin-flip? Make her prove it: if I’m alive tomorrow, vote me. Today, vote no-elim or Diana; real DT shouldn’t fear a confirm."

You: "Charlie’s counterpush is scummy: a real town wouldn’t advocate no-elim at 3v1. Diana, lock your result: did you get “Mafia” on Charlie? If yes, I’m voting Charlie. Charlie: why did you preempt pace D1?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
